Contact

The best way to reach me is via email. Please don’t send me spam.

I’m also on Hacker News, GitHub, and LinkedIn. I am quite active on GitHub, so of the 3, you’re most likely to catch me there. Still, 9/10 I would recommend you trying to email me before you go on some fool’s errand trying to find me on .

If you are trying to contact Sitrus, reach me should be what you want. I managed the Sitrus Twitter account, so once the platform launches that will be a potential avenue to reach me at.

If you would like to see a copy of my résumé, you can find the link here. If you would like any clarification, don’t hesitate to reach out.

Elliott Indiran
